content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a great place to live. Regarding the rental price, I'm open to discussing a fair and competitive rate. What did you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking for a place that offers good value for money. Since this is an unfurnished apartment in the city center, I understand that it might be priced higher. However, I'm a student and I'm on a budget. I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. How much are you looking to rent it for?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to strike a balance between offering a great apartment and receiving a fair rent. For an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I would typically expect a higher rent, but I'm willing to negotiate based on the market rate and your budget as a student. What is your maximum budget for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I'm trying to keep my expenses low. My maximum budget for rent is 800 Euro per month, including all utilities. Is this something we can work with for this unfurnished one-bedroom apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 800 Euro per month, including utilities, is a very reasonable budget for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's a bit lower than what I had initially considered, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the apartment for 750 Euro per month, including all utilities. This is a special rate for a student like yourself. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very appreciative of your offer. 750 Euro per month, including all utilities, is an excellent price for an apartment in the city center. It's within my budget, and it would be a great help to me as a student. I would like to take you up on this offer. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
